column1: This repository contains datasets part of the Pynn's Brook Experimental Watershed Area (PBEWA).
There are 3 sites within PBEWA; two stream sites along Horseshoe Brook: Upper and Lower Horseshoe (UHS and LHS, respectively), and a third terrestrial site.
Two types of data are gathered from these sites: Continuous datasets and discrete samples
Discrete water samples across PBEWA are collected from:
Unique water samples are labelled using the abbreviated sample type as a prefix and a number suffix.
Aliquots of discrete water samples are used for the following analyses:
